en-US: Select an overlay file to use.
de-DE: Select an overlay file to use.
zh-HANS: 选择要使用的覆盖文件。

en-US: Refreshes the list of available overlay files from the 'Overlays' directory in the Cities: Skylines II user settings directory.
de-DE: Aktualisiert die Liste der verfügbaren Overlay-Dateien aus dem 'Overlays' Verzeichnis in dem Benutzereinstellung-Ordner von Cities: Skylines II.
es-ES: Actualiza la lista de imágenes disponible en el directorio 'Overlays' en la carpeta de Cities: Skylines II.
zh-HANS: 刷新都市：天际线2用户设置目录中“Overlays”文件夹下的可用覆盖文件列表。

en-US: The size of the overlay image projection, in meters.  This can also be changed in-game using the minus and equals keys.
de-DE: The size of the overlay image projection, in meters.  This can also be changed in-game using the minus and equals keys.
es-ES: El tamaño de la proyección de la imagen superpuesta, en metros. Esto también se puede cambiar en el juego usando las teclas menos e igual.
zh-HANS: 覆盖图像的大小（单位：米）。在游戏中可以使用“ - ”键和“ + ”键进行调整。

en-US: Resets the overlay size to the default playable map size (14,336m).
de-DE: Resets the overlay size to the default playable map size (14,336m).
es-ES: Restablece el tamaño de la imagen superpuesta al tamaño por defecto jugable del mapa (14,336m).
zh-HANS: 重置覆盖图像的尺寸为默认地图大小（边长14336米）。

en-US: The X (east-west) coordinate of the center of the overlay image projection, in meters.  This can also be changed in-game using the left and right arrow keys while holding down control (for 1m increments) or shift (for 10m increments).
de-DE: The X (east-west) coordinate of the center of the overlay image projection, in meters.  This can also be changed in-game using the left and right arrow keys while holding down control (for 1m increments) or shift (for 10m increments).
es-ES: The X (east-west) coordinate of the center of the overlay image projection, in meters.  This can also be changed in-game using the left and right arrow keys while holding down control (for 1m increments) or shift (for 10m increments).
zh-HANS: The X (east-west) coordinate of the center of the overlay image projection, in meters.  This can also be changed in-game using the left and right arrow keys while holding down control (for 1m increments) or shift (for 10m increments).

en-US: The Z (north-south) coordinate of the center of the overlay image projection, in meters.  This can also be changed in-game using the up and down arrow keys while holding down control (for 1m increments) or shift (for 10m increments).
de-DE: The Z (north-south) coordinate of the center of the overlay image projection, in meters.  This can also be changed in-game using the up and down arrow keys while holding down control (for 1m increments) or shift (for 10m increments).
es-ES: The Z (north-south) coordinate of the center of the overlay image projection, in meters.  This can also be changed in-game using the up and down arrow keys while holding down control (for 1m increments) or shift (for 10m increments).
zh-HANS: The Z (north-south) coordinate of the center of the overlay image projection, in meters.  This can also be changed in-game using the up and down arrow keys while holding down control (for 1m increments) or shift (for 10m increments).

en-US: Resets the overlay position to the center of the map.
de-DE: Resets the overlay position to the center of the map.
es-ES: Resets the overlay position to the center of the map.
zh-HANS: Resets the overlay position to the center of the map.

en-US: The transparency of the image; 0% is fully opaque and 100% is fully transparent (invisible).
de-DE: The transparency of the image; 0% is fully opaque and 100% is fully transparent (invisible).
es-ES: La transparencia de la imagen; 0% es totalmente opaca y 100% totalmente transparente (invisible).
zh-HANS: 覆盖图像的透明度；0%为完全不透明，100%为完全透明（不可见）。
